description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.
duration_in_months: Allowed duration of the contract till closed
full_summary:
=====================================

* **Announcement Title**: Pump Unit Rotary (Commercial Bid Solicitation)
* **Solicitation Number (Appel d'offres)**: W8482-241735/A
* **Publication Date (Date de publication)**: 09 juin 2023
* **Bid Closing Date (Date limite de soumission)**: 21 juillet 2023, 14:00:00
* **Classification (Classement)**: Pump parts and accessories (Pièces et accessoires de pompe), 40151700
* **Contracting Entity (Entité contractante)**: National Defence (Défense nationale)
* **Contact Information (Informations de contact)**:

  * Christopher Cauchi, christopher.cauchi@forces.gc.ca, (555) 555-5555

Summary
-------

The National Defence is seeking Commercial Bids for the procurement of Pump Unit Rotary (Groupe motopompe, rotatoire). The delivery is requested to Canadian Forces Base Halifax, Nova Scotia, and Canadian Forces Base Esquimalt, British Columbia.

Required Items
--------------

* Pump Unit, Rotary (Groupe motopompe, rotatoire) :

  * Quantity: 3 units
  * Unit of Issue: Each (EA)
  * Part Number: 2887887-2
  * NCAGE Code: 10001
  * Original Design Activity DWG (Drawings)

 Terms and Conditions
------------------------

* Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

Attachments
------------

The Solicitation documents, including the RFP and Amendments, are available on the Canada Buys website at [link]. 

Note: The original notice has been edited and condensed to fit within the 400-word limit. Certain minor details have been omitted or rearranged for clarity. Though I tried to keep the content as intact and informative as possible, there may be slight discrepancies from the original text.

Last edited on June 20, 2023. This file contains valuable information which is crucial for Government contractors. Please review and follow instructions thoroughly. Do not hesitate to reach out if you find any inconsistencies or errors. 6092695
